transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good morning, web, main Aakash baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Mam, ek company hai aapki IndiaMART ka Khushboo Bazar.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, kaun? Good morning sir, main Aakash baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Hello Khushboo.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sir aapki company IndiaMART mein Khushboo Bazar. Iske regarding call kiya tha. Iski permission sir aap hi kar rahe hain?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Iski jo permission hai isko use aap hi kar rahe ho kya sir IndiaMART se?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir buyer kam kyu aa rahe hain aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi aa raha hai. Nahi aa raha hai. Koi deal hui hai abhi tak?
Customer: Nahi phone karte hain na to jaise humko buyleads to aata hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Usse buyleads aata hai to bolte bolte ki humko koi requirement nahi hai. Koi requirement nahi hai. Sir aapko 17 buyers aata hai beech mein. To kya har ek buyer ke sath aisa hota hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Customer: Ek buyer ka to call aaya tha wo bol rahe the ki humko itna piece chahiye. Hum unko WhatsApp pe bhej rahe the to wo bol unka WhatsApp hi nahi tha us number se. Uske baad call kar rahe the to utha hi nahi rahe the. Jaise aapne lead consume ki aur aapne unko apna catalog send kar diya. Uske baad aap unko call kar rahe ho?
Customer: Haan haan kiye the.
Executive: Kiye the. To unka reply nahi aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi aa raha hai. Nahi aa raha.
Executive: Theek hai. Samne se koi call aata hai buyer ka?
Customer: Do buyer ka call aaya hai. Do buyer ka call aaya hai.
Executive: Hmm. Hmm. Kuch baat hui? Do do do din pehle ek aaya tha aur kuch do saptah pehle ek aur aaya tha. October month mein do hi dikh raha hai bas. Haan. October month mein mujhe do hi dikh raha hai ki aapko keval do buyers ka call aaya hai October month mein. Haan. Haan. Theek hai. Unse kya baat hui aapki sir?
Customer: Wo bol rahe the ki humko chahiye tha. Wo bole the ki aap wo bole the buyer ki humko samples bhej dijiye WhatsApp par. Hmm. Sample kitne time pehle? To hum unko WhatsApp pe bheje to nahi to unka WhatsApp number hi chalu nahi tha. Wapas hum unko call back kar rahe the to utha hi nahi rahe the. Kitni baar call kiya tha aapne? Yahi teen char baar. Teen char baar. Aur ek dusre buyer ka hoga jo call kiya tha. Ek ka to ho gaya aap call uthaya nahi. Dusra kya bola?
Customer: Dusra phone kiye the to wo bole the ki humko itna piece chahiye hum bole theek hai kal hum bata dete hain final karke. To agle din wo phone hi nahi utha rahe the.
Executive: To unka WhatsApp number nahi hai?
Customer: Unka WhatsApp par bhej diye the hum. Bhej diye the. Haan. To na to pehle wale call ka answer kiya dobara mein na second wale ne kiya. Dono mein yahi hua hai.
Executive: Haan. Theek hai. Aur jo aapko mail pe enquiry aati hai uska kuch hai aapke paas ki aapki relevant aati hai ki nahi?
Customer: Achcha wo aaj papa aate hain na raat ko to dekhte hain unke mail pe.
Executive: Aisa karna sir. Kya? Ye jo aapke father ka naam wo hai mail ID. Theek hai? Haan haan. Ek sir aisa karna ki apna bhi isme mail ID add kar dena. In case kuch aisa hota hai ki jaise ki aap se contact nahi ho pa raha hai. Aapki ID work nahi kar rahi hai. Uska nuksan ho gaya hai. To sir us beech mein kya hai ki aapki jo second ID hogi na usse aap pura contact ho payega. Koi
Executive: Ye number aapka number kaunsa hai isme?
Customer: Yahi jisse baat ho raha hai 9525 wala. Isse isse baat ho raha hai. First kiska hai?
Executive: Kya? Jo first number hai 99 wala wo kiska hai? Father ka. Papa ka hai. Haan haan. To sir aisa karna ek baar jaise hi aapke father aate hain number unke paas hoga aur jab sir jo bhi kuch changes hoga na catalog mein wo aapke father ke number se hi hoga. Jo ID hai aapke father ki jo aapke father ka number hai usse changes hoga. Aur mujhe ye bataye ki isko kaunsi device se use karte hain aap? Laptop se karte hain phone se karte hain aap?
Customer: Dono se karte hain laptop phone dono se.
Executive: To aapka kehna ye hai ki aapki aaj tak koi deal nahi hui hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Aisa karte hain ek baar na buyleads mein requirement to aata hi hai. 100 piece 500 piece. Theek hai. Lekin hum unko call karte hain na to wo bolte hain ki humko koi requirement hi nahi hai.
Customer: Requirement hi nahi hai. Theek hai. Haan aur buyleads mein requirement aaya rehta hai.
Executive: Theek hai. To sir ek baar aapka laptop open hoga?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aayega nahi. Aapke WhatsApp pe bhej dunga aapke number pe. Theek hai. Ek meeting join karna hai. Theek hai. Theek. Number bataye WhatsApp ka apna.
Customer: Yahi hoga 9525 jisse baat ho rahi hai. 9525 aage bataye. 15 15 67 ha 67 ha 99. 9525156799. aapko link diya hai aapko link kiya ek baar. Aa gaya hoga aapko. Ji sir main. Jo mail ID hai na. Haan. Mujhe send kariye. WhatsApp par. Kyunki meeting update hogi usi ID se. Automatic aapko. Aage aap jaise offline shop hai. Aapko. Bhej diya. Bhej diya? Hmm. Ek minute rukiye main aapko bhejta hun. Mama aaj bus. Mama ke pass. Mama ke pass. Ek minute rukiye sir. Theek hai. Main aapko batata hun. Sir dekhiye WhatsApp aaya hua hai sir aapko check kariega ek baar. Kahan pe bheje WhatsApp par? WhatsApp par aaya hoga meeting ka. Usme likha hai meet.google.com aap us pe join kariega. Theek hai.

Executive: Haan ji sir. Ek baar screen share kariega apne system ki.
Executive: Ho gayi share. Theek hai. Ek baar isme open kariye apna IndiaMART.
Executive: Ho gaya. Theek hai. Main sir aapko WhatsApp pe WhatsApp call kar raha hun ek baar aaram se karna hai aapko call ka. Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. WhatsApp ka baat.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyers.

- No deals have been made so far.

- Buyers are not responding after initial contact.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested adding personal email ID.

- Executive offered to schedule a meeting.

- Executive shared meeting link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join the meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, follow up, meeting
